concept.title: Email Client API Overview
concept.shortdesc: This section provides an overview of the functionality and the architecture of the Email Client component.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Email Client API allows listing and accessing of mailboxes and email messages. It also provides functionality to create, forward, reply and search for messages.

section.title: Architecture
section.p: The Email Client API loads the Email Protocol Plug-ins. The plug-in interface defines functions for email operations and for accessing locally stored email data (accounts, folders, messages and message attachments). The plug-in interface is built on top of the Email Framework, which is based on the ECom framework. The Email Framework includes a common message store service which can be used by the plug-ins. The Email Server is a background process handling mailbox-related events.

section.title: Typical Uses
section.p:
The following use cases are supported by the Email Client API:
list and access mailboxes.
create, reply, and forward messages.
search messages.
launch a specific mailbox in email application.
